alert.note: Alert for Irwin; Lee; Terrell; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Irwin, Turner, Lee, east central Terrell and northwestern Worth Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smithville, or 9 miles northwest of Leesburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Ashburn, Ocilla, Albany, Smithville, Mystic, Worth, Sycamore, Warwick, Rebecca, Chokee, Stocks, Amboy, Irwinville, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Olivers Mill, Neyami and Century. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
